title: Who's the Houston Astros fan with the bodacious mustache?
text:
Who's the Houston Astros fan with the bodacious mustache?

CLOSE

HOUSTON - At some point during the Houston leg of the 2017 World Series - probably multiple points, even - broadcast cameras will focus on Astros fan Valentin Jalomo standing in his customary spot above the wall in left-center at Minute Maid Park. Jalomo's a dedicated season ticket holder of 10 years who has been attending Astros games regularly since the Astrodome opened in 1965.

Jalomo spoke briefly with For The Win about mustache upkeep before Game 3 of the World Series on Friday. Originally from Taft, Texas, the 78-year-old Jalomo said he first grew a mustache in his 20s, and began styling it the way he does now as far back as the 1970s.

(AP Photo/Houston Chronicle, Karen Warren)

To fashion his signature mustache's sharp antennae, Jalomo sprays both ends with hairspray and twists. He does not just reserve the style for Astros games, either: Jalomo wears that awesome mustache every single day.

description: Valentin Jalomo has been coming to Astros games since 1965.
